# chronosphere_pagerduty_alert_notifier (Resource)

Manages a Chronosphere Pagerduty Alert Notifier.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "chronosphere_pagerduty_alert_notifier" "oncall" {
  name = "PagerDuty On-Call"
  key  = var.pagerduty_integration_key
}
```
